# TaskWordsCounter
### Files description: ðŸ“‹

* WordsCounter.go	Source code:  for compiler in go language.
* words.txt		Input file: task file provide by Teacher.

## How to compile:

* Execute the following command.
* go build WordsCounter.go
* go run WordsCounter.go
